Armenia: Tamerlane's devastating invasion of Georgia, Armenia and Central Anatolia leads to the slaughter of large portions of the population of Armenia and the enslavement of over 60,000 people from Anatolia and the Caucasus.
Burma: Minkhaung I becomes king of Ava
Germany: The period of Meistersinger lyric poets began.
Philippine: Birth of the Baybayin, Hanunoo, Tagbanwa, and Buhid scripts from Brahmi.
Vietnam: Hồ Quý Ly overthrew the Đại Việt emperor, enthroned himself, renamed the country Đại Ngu and moved the capital to the citadel of the Hồ Dynasty.
